ohu 1982 di eksath janapada niyojitha mandalayata theri path wiya.me yatathe wasara 2 k pamana sewaya kala jon maken 1986 di eksath janapada senet mandalayata theri path wiya.ohu tharamak wiplawakari charithayak wu athara pakshaye thiranayanta yam yam awasthawanhidi patahaniwa prakashayan nikuth karana ha wiwechanaya karana deshapalanagnyayaku lesada prakatawa sitiyeya.janadhipathiwarana apekshakathwayata path wima jon maken mahathage deshapalna gaman magehi wadagath sandisthanayak wiya.

eya digatama digatama thanakola wawagena wawagena giya.mama wawapu hama mal gahakma wage ugullala dala thibbe ee wenakota.thalagoyi kapal eka eyagen masikawa gewanna rata thanakola illa gaththa.eyala aluthin gaththa idame wawanna kiyala.ape ofis eke kattiya kohomath maha eka widihaka kattiyak.ek kenek hurathaleta athikarapu karapoththo denna passe daha ate gunakara walata wadi wenna patan aragena nisa ofis eken nayak aragena thibba motin gahanna.api ofis kalekshan ekak damma eyata madi paduwata kiyala.

hari.dan mama me danwima gana kiyannam.danwimak kiwwata ekak neweyi.deka thunak.habayi ekama wyaparayak wenuwen karapu ekak.me danwimata peni inne ara "plenti wak karala bona" aluth gayakaya.(kawida kiyala dannawane)inne ara mokakda kiyana "nuldas" danwimaka.(boruwa oona na ne mata meka dakinakotanam uuru juwal naginawa) mehemayi,mama kiyanne na danwim dana eka waradiyi kiyala.eeth haddeyiyane elipitama ape sinhalakama nathiwena kota balan inna ba ne?awurudu ganak rakichcha sanskruthiya saha sinhalakama me eka eka paradeshakkara para ballanta winasha karanta ida denta ba nowa.
me wasaredi miliyana 21 tath wadi antharjala sambandhatha sahitha swayanpalaka ratha gananak nikuth kara athi bawath wartha weyi.
eeka nisa man wadi hondata eeke ekstenshan eka pitinma rinem kala…

gewi giya kalaye pa්rakata thanapathiwarun athara kamkaru nayakayakuwa siti ee.ee.gunasinha, raja hewawitharana aacharya nandadewa wijesekara, hitapu niyejya amathyawarayaku wu es.dabliw.alawathuwala saha hitapu maha bharakara yu.mapa yana pa්rakata pudgalayan sihiyata nange.janadhipathithumage thedina rajya charikawe di rajyathanthi්raka sakachchawalin anathuruwa pujaniya swedagon chaithya rajaya abiyasa maha pinkamak sidu kirimata miyanmaraye sha්ri lanka thanapathi karyalaya saha mehi aagamika katayuthu pilibanda amathyanshaya katayuthu siyalla sudanam kara atha.mehi di sha්ri lanka miyanmara thanapathi sabandatha aarambha wi hata wasarak pirima nimiththen miyanmaraye kula daruwan hatadenaku mahana kirima da siduwana athara sha්ri lanka janadhipathithuma wisin samanerayan wahanselata saha maha sangharathnayata siwuru pirikara puja kirima da thawath wadagath siduwimaki.
